targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp_represent AS "time",
  CASE
    WHEN condition_7day = 'white' THEN 0
    WHEN condition_7day = 'green' THEN 1
    WHEN condition_7day = 'yellow' THEN 2
    WHEN condition_7day = 'orange' THEN 3
    WHEN condition_7day = 'red' THEN 4
    WHEN condition_7day = 'darkred' THEN 5
    WHEN condition_7day = 'black' THEN 6
  ELSE null
  END AS '7-Tages-Warnstufe'
FROM combined
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp_represent) AND location = 'Germany'
ORDER BY timestamp_represent

SELECT
  timestamp_represent AS "time",
  CASE
    WHEN condition_14day = 'white' THEN 0
    WHEN condition_14day = 'green' THEN 1
    WHEN condition_14day = 'yellow' THEN 2
    WHEN condition_14day = 'orange' THEN 3
    WHEN condition_14day = 'red' THEN 4
    WHEN condition_14day = 'darkred' THEN 5
    WHEN condition_14day = 'black' THEN 6
  ELSE null
  END AS '14-Tages-Warnstufe'
FROM combined
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp_represent) AND location = 'Germany'
ORDER BY timestamp_represent

SELECT
  timestamp_represent AS "time",
  CASE
    WHEN alert_condition = 'white' THEN 0
    WHEN alert_condition = 'green' THEN 1
    WHEN alert_condition = 'yellow' THEN 2
    WHEN alert_condition = 'orange' THEN 3
    WHEN alert_condition = 'red' THEN 4
    WHEN alert_condition = 'darkred' THEN 5
    WHEN alert_condition = 'black' THEN 6
  ELSE null
  END AS 'Corona-Warnstufe'
FROM combined
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp_represent) AND location = 'Germany'
ORDER BY timestamp_represent

  male_smokers AS "Männliche Raucher",
  diabetes_prevalence AS "Diabetes Prävalenz",

    when cardiovasc_death_rate > 0 then (100 / population * (population / cardiovasc_death_rate))

  $__timeFilter(timestamp_represent) AND
  location = 'Germany'
ORDER BY timestamp_represent

SELECT 
timestamp_reported as "time", 
CONCAT(age_group_low, '-', age_group_high) as "name",
SUM(cases) as cases
FROM `positives` LEFT JOIN locations ON locations.uid = positives.district_uid 
WHERE 
 $__timeFilter(timestamp_reported) and
 gender = 'male'
GROUP BY locations.location, gender, age_group_low, age_group_high
ORDER BY age_group_low

SELECT 
timestamp_reported as "time", 
CONCAT(age_group_low, '-', age_group_high) as "name",
SUM(deaths) as deaths
FROM `positives` LEFT JOIN locations ON locations.uid = positives.district_uid 
WHERE 
 $__timeFilter(timestamp_reported) and
 gender = 'male'
GROUP BY locations.location, gender, age_group_low, age_group_high
ORDER BY age_group_low

SELECT 
timestamp_reported as "time", 
locations.location as "name",
SUM(cases) as cases
FROM `positives` LEFT JOIN locations ON locations.uid = positives.state_uid 
WHERE 
 $__timeFilter(timestamp_reported) and
 locations.country = 'Germany'
GROUP BY locations.location
ORDER BY locations.location

 gender = 'female'
